posts.body:
Zeronet Manga addition:
[nekonekonyan](/1MxhTsxNSTu2nzevPHi7QRT8kP4B5BB5LW/) this is the catgirl-centric gallery hub. nekololis doesn't have a theme outside of just lolis.

posts.subject: UN Proposal to Ban Fictional Works as "Child Pornography"
posts.body:
First I would like to state that this is an issue that is not exclusive to loli/shota fans. Policies such as this can and have resulted in censorship of even high school aged characters, in various forms of official and fan works.

tl;dr version:
The UN [wants the international community to ban](https://www.ohchr.org/EN/HRBodies/CRC/Pages/DraftGuidelinesOPs.aspx) ero depictions of underage characters. You can tell them you don't want this by sending a prewritten email using [this form](https://prostasia.org/campaign/art-not-csem/).

"i like to read" version:
My [ZeroMedium](/ZeroMedium.bit/?/1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB/un-proposal-to-ban-fictional-works-as-child-pornography) post on the topic
[Prostasia Foundation's](https://prostasia.org/blog/experts-to-united-nations-hentai-ban-would-be-a-mistake/) article on the topic
[One Angry Gamer's](https://www.oneangrygamer.net/2019/02/u-n-proposes-initiative-to-ban-loli-shota-and-underage-drawings-and-cartoons/77229/amp/) article on the topic

>>1f02b8fe-87e5-4918-adcd-7095de855f74
thanks for adding my loliguide site. i hope one of these days i'll sit down and update it and make it more accurate and friendlier to read.
also that video detonated my sides, i haven't laughed that hard in a long, long time!
